title: A Hierarchical Recurrent Encoder-Decoder for Generative Context-Aware Query Suggestion
authors: A Sordoni, Y Bengio, H Vahabi, C Lioma… - arXiv preprint arXiv: …
excerpt: Abstract: Users may strive to formulate an adequate textual query for their information need. Search engines assist the users by presenting query suggestions. To preserve the original search intent, suggestions should be context-aware and account for the previous queries  ...
